mapper.select: select mt.*, m.movie_code, m.movie_name, m.movie_grade, s.screen_name, s.screen_code, s.screen_total_seat, c.rmn_sts from tbl_movie_schedule sd, tbl_movie m, tbl_movie_screen s, (select movie_time_code, count(*) rmn_sts from tbl_schedule_seat s where seat_check = 'N' group by movie_time_code) c, (select movie_time_code, movie_schedule_code, screen_code, to_char(movie_start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') start_date, to_char(movie_start_time, 'HH24:MI') start_time, to_char(movie_end_time, 'HH24:MI') end_time from tbl_movie_time) mt where mt.start_date = #{start_date} and m.movie_code = #{movie_code} and mt.movie_schedule_code = sd.movie_schedule_code and sd.movie_code = m.movie_code and mt.screen_code = s.screen_code and mt.movie_time_code = c.movie_time_code

select ss.schedule_seat_code, ss.movie_time_code, ss.movie_seat_num, s.seat_code, ms.screen_seat_row, ms.screen_seat_col, ss.seat_check from tbl_schedule_seat ss, tbl_movie_seat s, tbl_movie_screen ms where movie_time_code = #{movie_time_code} and ss.movie_seat_num = s.movie_seat_num and s.screen_code = ms.screen_code order by movie_seat_num asc
select movie_time_code, movie_money from tbl_movie_time where movie_time_code = #{movie_time_code}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_movie_buy(movie_buy_num, movie_time_code, schedule_seat_code, screen_code, user_id) values(seq_movie_buy_num.nextval, #{movie_time_code}, #{schedule_seat_code}, #{screen_code}, #{user_id})

insert into tbl_movie_buy_list(movie_buy_list_num, movie_buy_num, movie_time_code, schedule_seat_code, movie_code, screen_code, user_id, movie_price) values(seq_movie_buy_list_num.nextval, 'MBL' || seq_movie_buy_list_num.nextval, #{movie_time_code}, #{schedule_seat_code}, #{movie_code}, #{screen_code}, #{user_id}, #{movie_price})
insert into tbl_point(point_num, point_code, user_id, point) values(seq_point_num.nextval, #{point_code}, #{user_id}, #{point})
